name: Rotate the castle
description:
Welcome to Rotate the Castle !!

It's a little rage game developed in Unity.

You play as a knight who has the mysterious power to rotate the castle walls. Use your power, wits and skills to reach the top floor of this huge castle!

But I warn you it won't be easy.

COMMANDS:

SPACE: Jump

WASD / ARROWS: Movement

Q / E / R: Rotate the castle

Pretty simple, isn't it? NO!

FUTURE UPDATE:

  • New levels (at least 10)
  • Controller support
  • New music
  • Menu options
  • Various bug fix
